articles.description: After the Amul vs Nandini row in Karnataka, it’s now Amul vs Aavin in Tamil Nadu. Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin has written to Union Home Minister Amit Shah, seeking his urgent intervention in the matter.

articles.title: Bhojpuri director Subhash Chandra Tiwari found dead in hotel room - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Bhojpuri film director Subhash Chandra Tiwari was found dead in his hotel room in Sonbhadra, Uttar Pradesh. Reportedly, he was staying in Hotel Tirupa
